Items.Name: Teleportation 1
Items.Effect: Draw 1 more level 2 Alien after drafting

Items.Name: Disruption Tech 1
Items.Effect: You must choose an invention to disable on each turn

Items.Name: Mind Control 1
Items.Effect: Lose 2 Research at start of turn

Items.Name: Improved Weapons 1
Items.Effect: For every 2 Threats you fail lose 1 Victory Point

Items.Name: Teleportation 2
Items.Effect: Draw 2 more level 2 Alien after drafting

Items.Name: Disruption Tech 2
Items.Effect: You must choose 2 inventions to disable on each turn

Items.Name: Mind Control 2
Items.Effect: Lose 4 Research at the start of turn

Items.Name: Improved Weapons 2
Items.Effect: For every 2 Threats you fail lose 2 Victory Points

Items.Name: Inevitable Conflict
Items.Flavor: You have stopped them for now, but the will be back
